secondaries.shortDescription: Psychic action (warp ch. 4 ,increase +1 every success), one psyker per turn, different objective each time (3pts per success)

subObjectives.description: Psychic action (warp ch. 4 ,increase +1 every success), by one psyker per turn, different objective each time.

secondaries.shortDescription: Choose only if enemy has psykers. Kill more models than the enemy with psychic powers this round. (3 pts)

subObjectives.description: Kiledl more models than the enemy with psychic powers this round.

secondaries.shortDescription: Infantry only action. Each unit in different not burned objective and not within your deployment zone. (4 pts per completed action)

subObjectives.description: Burned (action by Infantry) a new objective marker.

secondaries.shortDescription: Kill enemy psyker units in the psychic phase: character (5pts), any other (3pts)

subObjectives.description: Killed enemy psyker unit in the psychic phase.
Killed enemy psyker CHARACTER in the psychic phase.
